"The Secret of Success" - A musical about the behind-the-scenes world of Broadway and the secrets that make a hit musical.
"The Journey to the Stage" - A musical about a group of aspiring actors and their journey to make it big on Broadway.
"The Art of Collaboration" - A musical about the creative process of producing a hit Broadway musical and the collaboration between the cast, crew, and creative team.
"The Power of Imagination" - A musical about a young girl who dreams of becoming a Broadway star and the magical journey she takes to make her.

"The Music of the Future" - A musical about a group of young musicians who are trying to make a name for themselves in the competitive world of Broadway music and the challenges they face along the way.
